sen.j: 中臣宮処東人（なかとみの みやこの あずまびと。生年不詳-738年）は、奈良時代の官僚。
sen.e: NAKATOMI no Miyako no Azumabito (year of birth unknown - 738) was the bureaucracy in the Nara Period.
NAKATOMI no Miyako no Azumabito (year of birth unknown - 738) was the bureaucracy in the Nara Period.
NAKATOMI no Miyako no Azumabito (year of birth unknown - 738) was the bureaucracy in the Nara Period.

sen.j: 729年（天平元年）、漆部君足とともに長屋王に誣告した人物で、この時、無位。
sen.e: He was a person who made a false accusation against Prince Nagaya with NURIBE no Kimitari in 729, and he had no rank at this time.
He was a person who made a false accusation against Prince Nagaya with NURIBE no Kimitari in 729, and he had no rank at this time.
He was a person who made a false accusation against Prince Nagaya with NURIBE no Kimitari in 729, and he had no rank at this time.

sen.j: 事件後、外従五位下を賜り、食封30戸・田10町を与えられる。
sen.e: After this incident, he was conferred Ge-jugoinoge (Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) given to persons outside Kyoto) and granted jikifu 30-households (a vassal household allotted to courtier, shrines and temples) and 30-cho of rice paddy.

After this incident, he was conferred Ge-jugoinoge (Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) given to persons outside Kyoto) and granted jikifu 30-households (a vassal household allotted to courtier, shrines and temples) and 30-cho of rice paddy.

After this incident, he was conferred Ge-jugoinoge (Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) given to persons outside Kyoto) and granted jikifu 30-households (a vassal household allotted to courtier, shrines and temples) and 30-cho of rice paddy.

sen.j: 738年、大伴子虫により斬殺された。
sen.e: In 738, he was killed with sword by OTOMO no Komushi.
In 738, he was killed with sword by OTOMO no Komushi.
In 738, he was killed with sword by OTOMO no Komushi.

sen.j: 『続日本紀』によると、長屋王に恩遇を受けていた子虫により、囲碁のときに長屋王のことに及んで憤慨して殺されたとなっている。
sen.e: According to "Shoku Nihongi" (Chronicle of Japan Continued), when he was playing Igo (board game of capturing territory), their conversation turned to about Prince Nagaya, and this made OTOMO no Komushi who was given benefits by Prince Nagaya angry, and he was killed by Komushi.
